en: The Memorial Student Center was built in 1950 and officially dedicated on April 21, 1951 to A&M students who died in World War II. It was rededicated in 1976 to Aggies who have died in all past, present, and future wars. It has undergone considerable expansion and renovation since it was built, with a major renovation occuring between 2009-12.
